comments:
Description:
 NullPointerException occurred at expanding Binding branches, 
 when renaming the operation name with DBCS. 
 If using SBCS name, then it is OK. 
 If using WSDL file which contains DBCS named operation initially,
 then expanding binding branch works fine. The problem occurs only 
 when renaming the operation name in this WSDL editor.

 Build date: wtp-sdk-S-1.5RC2-200605051426.zip

 OS: Windows XP Japanese (SP2)
     Tomcat 5.5.15
     J2RE 1.5.0 IBM Windows 32 build pwi32dev-20051104

 Steps to recreate problem:
      1- Install Apatch Tomcat 5.5 to Eclipse
      2- Create a dynamic web project called AreaProj
      3- Prepare any WSDL file.
      4- Rename operation name with DBCS
      5- Save the file, then it should work fine. 
      6- Go to Outline view, and expand the rees for bindings.
         Then, NullPointerException occurred by failing DBCS named operation.

Expected Output: NullPointerException should be avoided.

Error Log:
